___businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.description: Business Premises Renovation Allowance if converting or renovating unused qualifying business premises. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.title: Business Premises Renovation Allowance

___allowanceOnSales.description: Allowances on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for less than their tax value). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___allowanceOnSales.title: Allowances on sales

___enhancedCapitalAllowance.description: 100% and other enhanced capital allowances. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___enhancedCapitalAllowance.title: Enhanced capital allowance

___capitalAllowanceSpecialRatePool.description: Capital allowances at 8% on equipment, including cars with higher CO2 emissions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___capitalAllowanceSpecialRatePool.title: Capital allowance special rate pool

___capitalAllowanceMainPool.description: Capital allowances at 18% on equipment, including cars with lower CO2 emissions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___capitalAllowanceMainPool.title: Capital allowance main pool

___tradingAllowance.description: A tax exemption of a limited amount for individuals with trading income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___tradingAllowance.title: Trading Allowance

___annualInvestmentAllowance.description: Annual investment allowance on items that qualify up to the AIA amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___annualInvestmentAllowance.title: Annual investment allowance

___zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.description: Zero emission goods vehicle allowance for goods vehicles purchased for business use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.title: Zero emission goods vehicle allowance

___capitalAllowanceSingleAssetPool.description: Capital Allowances for single asset pool costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___capitalAllowanceSingleAssetPool.title: Capital Allowances for single asset pool costs

___averagingAdjustment.description: Averaging adjustment (only for farmers, market gardeners and creators of literary or artistic works) – if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.
___averagingAdjustment.title: Averaging adjustment

___outstandingBusinessIncome.description: Any other business income not included in other fields. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___outstandingBusinessIncome.title: Outstanding business income

___accountingAdjustment.description: Adjustment for change of accounting practice. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___accountingAdjustment.title: Accounting adjustment

___goodsAndServicesOwnUse.description: Value of the normal sale price of goods or stock have been taken out of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___goodsAndServicesOwnUse.title: Goods and services own use

___balancingChargeBPRA.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (only where Business Premises Renovation Allowance has been claimed). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___balancingChargeBPRA.title: Balancing charge BPRA

___basisAdjustment.description: If your basis period is not the same as your accounting period, enter the adjustment needed to arrive at the profit or loss for the basis period – if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99
___basisAdjustment.title: Basis adjustment

___balancingChargeOther.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for more than their tax value). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___balancingChargeOther.title: Balancing charge Other

___includedNonTaxableProfits.description: Income, receipts and other profits included in business income or expenses but not taxable as business profits. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___includedNonTaxableProfits.title: Included not-taxable profits

___overlapReliefUsed.description: Overlap relief used this year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___overlapReliefUsed.title: Overlap relief used

___lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
___lossBroughtForward.title: Loss brought forward

___payVoluntaryClass2Nic.description: True if the taxpayer wants to make voluntary payments for class 2 nics on this source of income; false otherwise
___payVoluntaryClass2Nic.title: Pay voluntary Class 2 NIC

___class4NicInfo.description: Income, receipts and other profits included in business income or expenses but not taxable as business profits
___class4NicInfo.title: Included not-taxable profits

___isExempt.description: True if the taxpayer is exempt from paying class 4 nics on this source of income; false otherwise
___isExempt.title: isExempt
